law.text:
The state librarian shall annually on September 1 cause the State Treasurer to pay to each qualifying library out of the urban libraries fund, to the extent that funds are available, the sums computed as follows:
The sum of twenty-five cents ($0.25) for each resident of the county containing a qualifying library based on the then current census of such county supplied by the Bureau of Census, United States Department of Commerce; and
The remainder of available funds shall be divided equally between each qualifying library as defined by KRS 173.850.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 247, effective January 1, 2015. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 237, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 383, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980.
